Overview: City bloom is patchy. Map micro-flows (street trees, parks, balconies) to bridge dearths with planting and feeding plans.
Drivers & Mechanisms: Early: willow/ornamentals; mid: lime/parks; late: ivy/rooftop planters. Drought and mowing policy shift timing.
Mitigation & Best Practice: Coordinate with building managers for planter choices; stagger blooms; avoid pesticide-treated ornamentals.
